# Catch The Dot game that fits in a QR Code

Did you know that a QR code has a limit of 3 KB? (FYI, the QR code image that I am about to attach is already around 70KB.) For this reason, you may find my code a bit (very) hard to read, as it's meant to be as concise as possible.

## How to install and run

You have a couple of options:

- Run index.html, or
- Paste the data URI into the web, or
- Scan the QR code.


Data URI:
```
data:text/html;base64,
```

QR Code:

![Catch the Dot Qr Code](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81fa2a40-badb-41ff-ac62-4f2812446bfd)


## Note

This project was made for the SayCheese challenge by Hack Club.
